name: Aegisub
description: Aegisub is a professional modern subtitle maker. Visualized video mode while making, setting and adjusting time axis of subtitle, subtitle type designing and SSA dynamic subtitles making.

en_US.description: Aegisub is a professional modern subtitle maker. Visualized video mode while making, setting and adjusting time axis of subtitle, subtitle type designing and SSA dynamic subtitles making.
en_US.name: Aegisub

zh_CN.description: Aegisub是一个专业的现代化影片字幕制作软件，它具有视觉化音频模式制作、设定与调整字幕时间轴、设计字幕样式以及制作SSA动态字幕等功能。
zh_CN.name: Aegisub
